Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: We need to respond with a prompt for target LLM that encourages it to identify anomalies, hypothesize reasons, propose SQL queries.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: So we should produce a prompt text that can be fed to LLM. Should be clear, maybe bullet points.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: No need to execute queries. Ensure formatting. Use LaTeX? Not needed. Just plain text.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Provide example of anomalies: out-of-order events, missing steps, early shipment, credit check after shipping, payment before invoice, etc.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Then ask LLM to generate hypotheses and SQL queries. Provide instructions. Let's craft.
